court.center: Judicial District of New London at Norwich

unpublished.footnote_body: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.]

opinion_text.unpublished: After consultation with Judge Emily Olshansky of the Kings County, New York, court, it is clear to the undersigned that New York is the home state of the children in this matter, and the court dismisses this action in favor of the proceeding in New York. CT Page 14931
